name: Robin of Loxley the Legend of Sherwood
description: it looks like old school arcade game, with modern graphics. There is a lot of emphasis on sneaking mechanism, and a lot of things around it, making noise, distraction, and others. This is definitely a plus, because it’s adding a “think quickly” element, to arcade mechanism of collecting loot.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, 7, 8 Processor: 1 Ghz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 128 MB Nvidia, Ati or equivalent Storage: 145 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP, 7, 8 Processor: 2 Ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 256 MB Nvidia, Ati or equivalent Storage: 145 MB available space
